name: flickr.stats.getPhotoStats
description: Get the number of views, comments and favorites on a photo for a given date.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: date
arguments.description:
Stats will be returned for this date. This should be in either be in YYYY-MM-DD or unix timestamp format.

A day according to Flickr Stats starts at midnight GMT for all users, and timestamps will automatically be rounded down to the start of the day.

arguments.name: photo_id
arguments.description: The id of the photo to get stats for.
